duration_raw: until the next time you make your daily preparations.
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 4" pfs="Standard">
[Spell Immunity](/Spells.aspx?ID=296)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 371 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Bloodline**
[Draconic](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=5)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** until the next time you make your daily preparations.
</row>

</column>

---

You ward a creature against the effects of a single spell. Choose a spell and name it aloud as part of the verbal component. _Spell immunity_ attempts to counteract that spell whenever _spell immunity_'s target is the target of the named spell or in that spell's area. Successfully counteracting a spell that targets an area or multiple targets with spell immunity negates the effects only for the target affected by _spell immunity_.
name: Spell Immunity

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 371 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Traditions**

**Bloodline**
[Draconic](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=5)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

 

 
</row>

**Range** touch

 

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** until the next time you make your daily preparations.
</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Name a spell to negate its effects on you.
</summary>
summary: Name a spell to negate its effects on you.
